entry.title: Let's talk about JWT
entry.summary:
Description

JSON Web Tokens, or JWTs for short, are all over the web. They can be used to track bits of information about a user in a very compact way and can be used in APIs for authorization purposes. Join me and learn what JWTs are, what problems it solves …
entry.content:
Description

JSON Web Tokens, or JWTs for short, are all over the web. They can be used to track bits of information about a user in a very compact way and can be used in APIs for authorization purposes. Join me and learn what JWTs are, what problems it solves, how you can use JWTs, and how to be safer when using JWTs on your applications. All of that with some examples on how to validate and deal with JWTs in Python.

entry.title: Panel Discussion: Vozes na Tecnologia: Contando Experiências na Indústria de Tecnologia
Serenata de Amor: Inteligência artificial usando dados abertos governamentais
